title: Don’t register startup outside India unless you have a very strong reason: Livspace's Ramakant Sharma
description: Livspace cofounder Ramakant Sharma urges startups to register their domiciles in India unless there is a strong reason against it. He emphasizes the benefits of doing business in India, including attracting talent and capital. This advice comes as Livspace prepares to shift its domicile from Singapore to India.
content: Livspace cofounder Ramakant Sharma called on startups to register their domiciles in India “until and unless there is a very strong reason” against it.
cleaned_content: livspace cofounder ramakant sharma called on startups to register their domiciles in india until and unless there is a very strong reason against it
